title: Wharf Rat = Omen?
body:
So I see this thing in the client and I thought "Oh look, Riot are actually releasing Omen. I thought it was dead." However that was not the case as I read the context. Just something on the Wharf Rat concept.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Omen
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/origins-wharf-rat

Riot are running out of excuses, I could see a Handler/Leash type of champion duo featuring this thing.

Also WHARF RAT TWITCH SKIN WHERE??? Missed a great opportunity there Riot.
